items.sentence: Tom has been hanging out with a woman who's half his age.
Tom had his shirt unbuttoned when I saw him this morning.
Mary smiled when she noticed Tom was staring at her legs.
Mary is pretty sure Tom is going to ask her to marry him.
"Did you see my cat?" "No." "Liar, you're still chewing!"
Tom looked around for something he could use as a weapon.
This is how people get rid of things they no longer need.
This is the last time I'll ask you to do anything for me.
If Tom hadn't been busy, I would've talked to him longer.
Tom was crossing the bridge when it got hit by lightning.
They'll stop at nothing to achieve their political goals.
As long as we've driven this far, we might as well go on.
Even though I could take a bus to school, I usually walk.
There's no need to set the table. We're going out to eat.
The room that the kidnappers locked me in had no windows.
It's a hassle trying to decide what to wear to the party.
Tom should mind his own business and look after his kids.
Tom plays flute in the woodwind section of the orchestra.
The story of how Tom and Mary met is quite extraordinary.
Tom ran for his life when he realized what was happening.
